instructions.name: buy_ticket_and_start_game
docs: Buy ticket and start game in one transaction (RECOMMENDED)

instructions.name: claim_lucky_draw_prize
docs: Claim lucky draw prize - winner must provide Merkle proof of their position

docs: Merkle root for verifying winner's position in candidates list

docs: Lucky draw vault - source of prize funds

docs: Consume VRF randomness and select lucky draw winning index

accounts.name: vrf_program_identity
docs: VRF program identity ensures callback is from VRF program

instructions.name: create_session_permission
docs: Create session permission for Private ER (player can read session)

accounts.name: player
docs: The player who owns the session

accounts.name: session
docs: The session account to protect

docs: Create permission for target word (with empty members - no one can read)

docs: The player who owns the target word

accounts.name: target_word
docs: The target word account to protect

instructions.name: delegate_session
docs: Delegate session to TEE for write access (standard ER delegation)

instructions.name: delegate_session_permission
docs: Delegate session to Ephemeral Rollup

accounts.name: player
docs: The player who owns the session (authority)

accounts.name: session
docs: The session account to delegate

instructions.name: delegate_target_word
docs: Delegate target word to TEE for write access (standard ER delegation)

docs: Delegate target word and permission to TEE

accounts.name: player
docs: The player who owns the target word (authority)

instructions.name: initialize_lucky_draw_state
docs: Initialize lucky draw state (must be called before request_lucky_draw)

instructions.name: initialize_session
docs: Initialize session account (one-time setup)

instructions.name: initialize_target_word
docs: Initialize target word account (stores secret word separately)

accounts.name: player
docs: The player who owns the session

accounts.name: session
docs: The session account

accounts.name: target_word
docs: The target word account to create

instructions.name: initialize_voble_vault
docs: Initialize Voble vault separately (for deferred token setup)

instructions.name: request_lucky_draw
docs: Request VRF randomness for lucky draw
SECURITY: participants_root must be set BEFORE calling this

accounts.name: participants_root
docs: Participants Merkle root - MUST exist before VRF request to prevent manipulation
Binding this to the VRF seed makes reordering participants pointless

instructions.name: reset_session
docs: Reset session state and request randomness for word selection

accounts.name: target_word
docs: The target word account for storing the secret word

instructions.name: set_weekly_participants_root
docs: Set weekly participants Merkle root (called before lucky draw)

accounts.name: target_word
docs: The target word account (private, but readable by TEE for evaluation)

instructions.name: undelegate_session_permission
docs: Undelegate session and permission from Ephemeral Rollup

accounts.name: daily_leaderboard
docs: Daily leaderboard to update - THIRD

accounts.name: weekly_leaderboard
docs: Weekly leaderboard to update - FOURTH

accounts.name: monthly_leaderboard
docs: Monthly leaderboard to update - FIFTH

accounts.name: user_profile
docs: User profile to update stats - SIXTH

instructions.name: update_voble_mint
docs: Update Voble token mint address (for deferred token setup)

accounts.name: new_voble_mint
docs: The new Voble token mint

instructions.name: withdraw_referral_payout
docs: Pay referral commission from platform vault to referrer

accounts.name: referrer
docs: The referrer receiving the payout

accounts.name: referrer_token_account
docs: Referrer's USDC token account (created with init_if_needed)

errors.name: NoParticipants
errors.msg: No participants found for this period

errors.name: DailyLimitExceeded
errors.msg: Daily play limit exceeded (1 game per day)

errors.name: InvalidWinnerOrder
errors.msg: Winners not sorted correctly by score

errors.name: WordNotSet
errors.msg: Target word not set - VRF callback pending

errors.name: InvalidGuess
errors.msg: Invalid guess format (must contain only letters)

errors.name: AlreadyPlayedThisPeriod
errors.msg: Player has already played this period

errors.name: TicketAlreadyUsed
errors.msg: Ticket receipt already used for this session

errors.name: PeriodNotFinalized
errors.msg: Period must be finalized before lucky draw

types.name: GlobalConfig
docs: Global configuration for the Voble game

types.name: GuessData
docs: Guess data with letter results

types.name: LeaderEntry
docs: Single leaderboard entry

types.name: LetterResult
docs: Result for each letter in a guess

types.name: LuckyDrawState
docs: Lucky Draw State (moved from prize.rs for ARCH-2)

types.name: PeriodLeaderboard
docs: Period leaderboard tracking top players

types.name: PeriodState
docs: Period state tracking finalization and winners

types.name: PeriodType
docs: Period type enum

types.name: SessionAccount
docs: Active game session state (public - readable by player)

types.name: TargetWordAccount
docs: Target word account (private - stored on TEE with empty permission)
Separated from SessionAccount to allow session to be readable while word is hidden

types.name: UserProfile
docs: User profile storing player stats and history

types.name: WeeklyParticipantsRoot
docs: Weekly participants Merkle root (moved from prize.rs for ARCH-2)

types.name: WinnerEntitlement
docs: Winner entitlement for prize claiming
